ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ lɔɔn ńdɔ́ɔn, mbà à te pfɛ́ wɔ́.
en: If you cook, then he won't eat.

ngiemboon: À těen tóŋo ndàʼ melÿò wɔ́
en: He does not only call the great ones

ngiemboon: À těen tóŋo ndàʼ melÿò wɔ́

en: He does not only call the great ones
Come so we can go “mbà lóo”!
Those who transplant the potato are looking for the seed.
